content: this easy pattern is perfect for donegal tweed gradient by garn manufaktur 100% merino wool forms this classic donegal tweed it has a rustic look with a super soft touch the gradient colors slowly transcend from one hue to the next each cake comes with 200g and 212 yards - enough for a good sized shawl or nice long scarf or full cowl get this amazing yarn here 1 note farbverlauf means gradient in german 1 https //www makersmercantile com/shop/c/p/donegal-tweed-gradient-x59021192 htm
